description:
This plugin allows you to generate and download an Excel .xlsx file directly from a JSON array. Useful for exporting reports, tables, or any structured data from your Bubble app.

Example Usage


- rawJSON:
[
  {"Name": "Alice", "Age": 30, "City": "Paris"},
  {"Name": "Bob", "Age": 25, "City": "Lyon"}
]

- Column Widths:
20,10,15

- Filename:
user_export
name: JSON to Excel (xlsx)
